title: Science Professional Course for Knowledge Transfer Theory and Situated Learning Application

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Scientific Concept Comprehension and Introductory Knowledge in Specialized Fields (Medical/Legal/Technical)
context.additional_context: Emphasizes the ability to apply and transform knowledge across diverse scientific contexts (laboratory, field, simulation). Parallel use of digital/analog resources in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can adjust knowledge perspectives by analyzing at least three situational characteristics (requirements, possibilities, constraints).
Learners can transform and apply scientific knowledge to real-world professional contexts (medical/legal/technical).
Learners can design situational attunement strategies to facilitate knowledge transfer between domains (theory-practice in science).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
